name: Everything kills me
description:
---How to play---

X For take things, attack and break things.

Z When you have 2 junks it becomes a fireball.

O For options.

P For pause.

Kill enemies.

The bar with the soda symbol represents the level of oxidation, sodas clean the rust, drink soda to clean yourself because the oxygen in the air oxidizes you little by little...

Take the batteries for more energy.

You lose energy when the enemy hits you.

---Story---

An accident in a laboratory brought from another world an alien robot that cannot survive in our world because the material it is made of is very sensitive to oxygen, and there is too much oxygen in the air...

Help the alien-robot to escape.
